info.title: Bluesky Social
info.description: Specification for the Bluesky Social endpoints. Includes endpoints for social interaction, admin, chat, ATProto, and ozone.

get.description: Retrieve the user's preferences.

200.description: Successfully retrieved preferences for the current account.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Detailed Profile of an Actor
get.description: Retrieve the profile of a specific actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the account to fetch the profile of.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the actor's detailed profile.

avatar.description: URI for the actor's avatar image.

banner.description: URI for the actor's banner image.

followersCount.description: Number of followers the actor has.

followsCount.description: Number of accounts the actor is following.

postsCount.description: Number of posts by the actor.

lists.description: Number of lists the actor is part of.

feedgens.description: Number of feed generators associated with the actor.

starterPacks.description: Number of starter packs associated with the actor.

labeler.description: Indicates if the actor is a labeler.

joinedViaStarterPack.description: Starter pack details if the actor joined via one.

cid.description: Content identifier of the starter pack.

record.description: Record details of the starter pack.

labels.description: Labels associated with the starter pack.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the actor's profile was last indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the actor's profile was created.

muted.description: Indicates if the actor is muted.

blockedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is blocked by the viewer.

following.description: Indicates if the viewer is following the actor.

followedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is following the viewer.

cid.description: Content identifier of the pinned post.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Detailed Profiles of Multiple Actors
get.description: Retrieve profiles for multiple actors.

parameters.name: actors
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of handles or DIDs of the accounts to fetch profiles for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved detailed profiles of the specified actors.

profiles.description: An array of detailed profile views for the specified actors.

avatar.description: URI for the actor's avatar image.

banner.description: URI for the actor's banner image.

followersCount.description: Number of followers the actor has.

followsCount.description: Number of accounts the actor is following.

postsCount.description: Number of posts by the actor.

lists.description: Number of lists the actor is part of.

feedgens.description: Number of feed generators associated with the actor.

starterPacks.description: Number of starter packs associated with the actor.

labeler.description: Indicates if the actor is a labeler.

muted.description: Indicates if the actor is muted.

blockedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is blocked by the viewer.

following.description: Indicates if the viewer is following the actor.

followedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is following the viewer.

cid.description: Content identifier of the pinned post.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve account suggestions for the user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of suggestions to retrieve.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

actors.description: An array of suggested actor profiles.

avatar.description: URI of the actor's avatar image.

lists.description: Number of lists the actor is part of.

feedgens.description: Number of feed generators associated with the actor.

starterPacks.description: Number of starter packs associated with the actor.

labeler.description: Indicates if the actor is a labeler.

allowIncoming.description: Specifies if incoming chats are allowed.

muted.description: Indicates if the actor is muted by the viewer.

blockedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is blocked by the viewer.

blocking.description: Details of the block, if applicable.

following.description: Indicates if the viewer is following the actor.

followedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is following the viewer.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Update the user's preferences.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the preferences to be updated.

200.description: Successfully updated preferences for the current account.

success.description: Indicates whether the preferences update was successful.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Search for actors by a query term.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search term used to find actors.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a list of actors matching the search term.

actors.description: An array of actors matching the search criteria.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve account suggestions for typeahead search.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search term used for typeahead results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved typeahead suggestions for actors.

actors.description: An array of minimal actor details matching the typeahead search.

avatar.description: URI of the actor's avatar image.

lists.description: Number of lists the actor is part of.

feedgens.description: Number of feed generators associated with the actor.

starterPacks.description: Number of starter packs associated with the actor.

labeler.description: Indicates if the actor is a labeler.

allowIncoming.description: Specifies if incoming chats are allowed.

muted.description: Indicates if the actor is muted by the viewer.

blockedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is blocked by the viewer.

blocking.description: Details of the block, if applicable.

following.description: Indicates if the viewer is following the actor.

followedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is following the viewer.

createdAt.description: The timestamp of the actor's profile creation.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve metadata about the feed generator.

parameters.name: generatorUri
parameters.description: The URI of the feed generator to describe.

200.description: Successfully retrieved metadata about the feed generator.

did.description: Decentralized Identifier of the feed generator.

feeds.description: A list of feed URIs associated with the feed generator.

links.description: Relevant links or metadata for the feed generator.

privacyPolicy.description: URL of the feed generator's privacy policy.

termsOfService.description: URL of the feed generator's terms of service.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve feeds created by a specific actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor whose feeds are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of feeds to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next page of results.

feeds.description: An array of feeds created by the actor.

did.description: Decentralized Identifier of the feed creator.

description.example: Latest updates in the tech world.

descriptionFacets.description: Facets for highlighting specific parts of the description.

avatar.description: URL of the feed's avatar image.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the feed.

acceptsInteractions.description: Whether the feed accepts interactions like likes or comments.

like.description: URI of the viewer's like on the feed.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed was indexed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Liked Posts by an Actor
get.description: Retrieve posts liked by a specific actor.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor whose liked posts are being retrieved.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of liked posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the liked posts by the actor.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next page of results.

feed.description: An array of posts liked by the actor.

post.description: Details of the liked post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

record.description: Additional record details for the post.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of reposts of the post.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes for the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

record.description: Additional record details for the thread.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve posts from a specific author.

parameters.name: author
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the post author.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the posts by the author.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

post.description: Details of the post.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of reposts of the post.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes of the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

repost.description: URI of the viewer's repost of the post.

like.description: URI of the viewer's like on the post.

threadMuted.description: Indicates if the viewer muted the thread.

replyDisabled.description: Indicates if replies are disabled for the post.

embeddingDisabled.description: Indicates if embedding is disabled for the post.

pinned.description: Indicates if the post is pinned.

record.description: Record metadata for the thread gate.

lists.description: Lists associated with the thread gate.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Feed for a Specific URI
get.description: Retrieve posts from a specific feed or tag.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: URI of the feed to retrieve.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to retrieve in the feed.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through the feed.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

post.description: Details of the post.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the author is a labeler.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the author.

blockedBy.description: Whether the viewer is blocked by the author.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

reply.description: Reply-specific metadata for the feed item.

reason.description: Reason for including the feed item.

feedContext.description: Context of the feed item in the feed.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed item was indexed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Metadata for a Feed Generator
get.description: Retrieve metadata about a specific feed generator.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: URI of the feed generator to retrieve metadata for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved metadata for the feed generator.

view.description: Detailed metadata about the feed generator.

cid.description: Content identifier for the feed generator.

did.description: DID of the feed generator creator.

creator.description: Information about the creator of the feed generator.

avatar.description: URL of the creator's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the creator is a labeler.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the creator was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the creator was created.

displayName.description: Display name of the feed generator.

descriptionFacets.description: Facets within the description of the feed generator.

avatar.description: URL of the feed generator's avatar image.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the feed generator.

acceptsInteractions.description: Whether the feed generator accepts interactions.

labels.description: Labels associated with the feed generator.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed generator was indexed.

isOnline.description: Whether the feed generator is online.

isValid.description: Whether the feed generator is valid.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Metadata for Multiple Feed Generators
get.description: Retrieve metadata about multiple feed generators.

parameters.name: generators
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of feed generator URIs to retrieve metadata for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved metadata for multiple feed generators.

feeds.description: An array of feed generator metadata.

items.description: Metadata for a single feed generator.

cid.description: Content identifier for the feed generator.

did.description: DID of the feed generator creator.

creator.description: Information about the creator of the feed generator.

avatar.description: URL of the creator's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the creator is a labeler.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the creator was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the creator was created.

displayName.description: Display name of the feed generator.

descriptionFacets.description: Facets within the description of the feed generator.

avatar.description: URL of the feed generator's avatar image.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the feed generator.

acceptsInteractions.description: Whether the feed generator accepts interactions.

labels.description: Labels associated with the feed generator.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed generator was indexed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve a minimal skeletal version of a feed.

parameters.name: feed
parameters.description: URI of the feed to retrieve the skeleton for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items in the skeleton.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating the skeleton.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

feed.description: An array of skeleton feed items.

items.description: Details of a skeleton feed item.

post.description: URI of the feed item post.

reason.description: Reason for including the feed item.

feedContext.description: Context of the feed item in the skeleton.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve users who liked a specific post.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the post to retrieve likes for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of likes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved likes for the specified post.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

likes.description: An array of actors who liked the post.

items.description: Details of a user who liked the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the like was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the like was created.

actor.description: Details of the actor who liked the post.

avatar.description: URL of the actor's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the actor is a labeler.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the actor was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the actor was created.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the actor.

blockedBy.description: Whether the viewer is blocked by the actor.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve posts from a specific list.

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: URI of the list to retrieve the feed for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for navigating through the feed.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next page.

post.description: Details of the post.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the author is a labeler.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the author.

blockedBy.description: Whether the viewer is blocked by the author.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the post was created.

reply.description: Reply-specific metadata for the feed item.

reason.description: Reason for including the feed item.

feedContext.description: Context of the feed item in the feed.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed item was indexed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve specific posts by their URIs.

parameters.name: uris
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of post URIs to retrieve.

posts.description: An array of posts corresponding to the provided URIs.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the author is a labeler.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the author.

blockedBy.description: Whether the viewer is blocked by the author.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the author was created.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of reposts of the post.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes of the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

repost.description: URI of the viewer's repost of the post.

like.description: URI of the viewer's like on the post.

threadMuted.description: Whether the viewer muted the thread.

replyDisabled.description: Whether replies are disabled for the post.

embeddingDisabled.description: Whether embedding is disabled for the post.

lists.description: Lists associated with the thread gate.

avatar.description: URL of the list's avatar image.

listItemCount.description: Number of items in the list.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve the thread of posts related to a specific post.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the post to retrieve the thread for.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the thread for the specified post.

thread.description: The root post of the thread with its replies.

root.description: The root post of the thread.

cid.description: Content identifier of the root post.

author.description: Information about the author of the root post.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the root post was created.

replies.description: An array of replies to the root post.

items.description: Details of a reply to the root post.

cid.description: Content identifier of the reply post.

author.description: Information about the author of the reply post.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the reply post was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Posts Quoting a Specific Post
get.description: Retrieve posts that quote a specific post.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the post to retrieve quotes for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of quotes to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved posts quoting the specified post.

cid.description: Content identifier of the original post.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

posts.description: An array of posts that quote the specified post.

cid.description: Content identifier of the quoted post.

author.description: Information about the author of the quoted post.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the author is a labeler.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the author.

blockedBy.description: Whether the viewer is blocked by the author.

embed.description: Embed metadata for the quoted post.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the quoted post.

repostCount.description: Number of reposts of the quoted post.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the quoted post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes of the quoted post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the quoted post was indexed.

labels.description: Labels associated with the quoted post.

cid.description: Content identifier of the thread gate.

lists.description: Lists associated with the thread gate.

avatar.description: URL of the list's avatar image.

listItemCount.description: Number of items in the list.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.summary: Get Actors Who Reposted a Specific Post
get.description: Retrieve users who reposted a specific post.

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: URI of the post to retrieve reposts for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of reposts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved actors who reposted the post.

cid.description: Content identifier of the original post.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

repostedBy.description: An array of actors who reposted the specified post.

items.description: Details of an actor who reposted the post.

description.description: Bio or description of the actor.

avatar.description: URL of the actor's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the actor is a labeler.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the actor.

blockedBy.description: Whether the viewer is blocked by the actor.

blocking.description: Whether the viewer is blocking the actor.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the actor was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the actor was created.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve suggested feeds for the user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of suggested feeds to retrieve.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

creator.description: Details about the creator of the feed.

description.description: Bio or description of the creator.

avatar.description: URL of the creator's avatar image.

labeler.description: Whether the creator is a labeler.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the creator was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the creator was created.

description.description: A brief description of the feed.

avatar.description: URL of the feed's avatar image.

likeCount.description: Number of likes for the feed.

like.description: Whether the viewer liked the feed.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the feed was indexed.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve the timeline of posts for the user.

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: The algorithm used to generate the timeline (e.g., reverse chronological).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor for navigating through results.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next set of results.

feed.description: Array of posts in the user's timeline.

items.description: Details of a post in the timeline.

post.description: Details of the post.

avatar.description: URL of the author's avatar.

labeler.description: Whether the author is a labeler.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the author was indexed.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the author was created.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of reposts of the post.

likeCount.description: Number of likes for the post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes of the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

repost.description: Whether the viewer reposted the post.

like.description: Whether the viewer liked the post.

threadMuted.description: Whether the thread is muted by the viewer.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Search for posts matching a query.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: The search term used to find posts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of posts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved posts matching the search term.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for the next page of results.

hitsTotal.description: Total number of posts matching the search term.

posts.description: An array of posts matching the search criteria.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Send interactions (like, repost) for a post.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: An object containing the interactions to be sent.

interactions.description: An array of interactions to send.

uri.description: URI of the post the interaction is for.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the interaction was created.

success.description: Indicates whether the interactions were successfully sent.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve starter packs of accounts for new users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of starter packs to retrieve.

starterPacks.description: An array of actor starter packs.

title.description: The title of the starter pack.

actors.description: An array of actor profiles included in the pack.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve users blocked by the authenticated user.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of blocked accounts to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

blocks.description: An array of profiles representing blocked accounts.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Get a list of followers for a user.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor to retrieve followers for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of followers to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved followers for the actor.

followers.description: An array of profiles representing followers.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor to retrieve follows for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of follows to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

200.description: Successfully retrieved accounts followed by the actor.

follows.description: An array of profiles representing accounts followed by the actor.

parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor to retrieve known followers for.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of known followers to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

followers.description: An array of profiles representing known followers.

get.description: Retrieve a specific list of users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of list items to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

listItems.description: An array of profiles or items in the list.

parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

blockedAccounts.description: An array of profiles representing blocked accounts within the list.

parameters.description: Max num of muted lists to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor

get.description: Retrieve all lists for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor to retrieve lists for.

parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

get.description: Retrieve muted users for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: cursor

mutedAccounts.description: An array of profiles representing muted accounts.

get.description: Retrieve relationships between the authenticated user and specified accounts.

parameters.name: actors
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of actor DIDs or handles to retrieve relationships for.

relationships.description: An array of relationship data between the authenticated user and specified actors.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

get.description: Retrieve a single starter pack for a new user.

parameters.name: pack
parameters.description: URI of the starter pack to retrieve.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the starter pack details.

title.description: The title of the starter pack.

actors.description: An array of profiles included in the starter pack.

get.description: Retrieve all starter packs for new users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of starter packs to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

title.description: The title of the starter pack.

get.summary: Get Suggested Follows Based on Actor
get.description: Retrieve suggested accounts to follow, filtered by an actor.

parameters.description: Handle or DID of the actor to base suggestions on.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max num of suggestions to retrieve.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor for navigating through results.

suggestedFollows.description: An array of suggested profiles to follow.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid authentication token.

post.description: Mute a specific actor for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Details of the actor to mute.

actor.description: Handle or DID of the actor to mute.

success.description: Indicates if the actor was successfully muted.

post.description: Mute a specific list of actors for the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Details of the actor list to mute.

list.description: URI of the actor list to mute.

success.description: Indicates if the actor list was successfully muted.

post.description: Mute an entire thread of posts for the authenticated user.

Preferences.description: An object containing preferences attached to the current account.

profileVisibility.description: The visibility of the user's profile (e.g., 'public', 'private').

messagePermissions.description: Who can send messages to the user (e.g., 'anyone', 'contacts').

ProfileViewDetailed.description: Detailed profile view of an actor.

displayName.description: The display name of the actor.

bio.description: The biography or about section of the actor.

avatar.description: URL of the actor's avatar image.

banner.description: URL of the actor's banner image.

followersCount.description: Number of followers the actor has.

followingCount.description: Number of accounts the actor is following.

postsCount.description: Total number of posts the actor has made.

isFollowing.description: Whether the authenticated user is following the actor.

isFollowedBy.description: Whether the authenticated user is followed by the actor.

FeedItem.description: Details of a single feed item.

reason.description: Reason for including the post in the feed.

Post.description: Metadata and content of a post.

replyCount.description: Number of replies to the post.

repostCount.description: Number of reposts of the post.

likeCount.description: Number of likes on the post.

quoteCount.description: Number of quotes of the post.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the post was indexed.

avatar.description: Avatar URL of the profile.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the profile was created.

labeler.description: Indicates if the profile is a labeler.

repost.description: URI of the viewer's repost of the post.

like.description: URI of the viewer's like of the post.

threadMuted.description: Indicates if the thread is muted by the viewer.

pinned.description: Indicates if the post is pinned.

Label.description: Labels associated with a post or profile.

neg.description: Indicates if the label is negative.

Threadgate.description: Access restrictions and details for a thread.

avatar.description: Avatar of the list item.

listItemCount.description: Count of items in the list.

labels.description: Labels associated with the list item.

MutedByList.description: Details of a list that muted the actor.

uri.description: URI of the list that muted the actor.

avatar.description: Avatar image URI for the list.

listItemCount.description: Number of items in the list.

indexedAt.description: The timestamp when the list was indexed.

BlockingByList.description: Details of a list that blocks the actor.

uri.description: URI of the list that blocks the actor.

avatar.description: Avatar image URI for the list.

listItemCount.description: Number of items in the list.

indexedAt.description: The timestamp when the list was indexed.

ViewerMetadata.description: Metadata about the viewer's relationship to the actor.

muted.description: Indicates if the actor is muted by the viewer.

blockedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is blocked by the viewer.

blocking.description: Indicates if the viewer is blocking the actor.

following.description: Indicates if the viewer is following the actor.

followedBy.description: Indicates if the actor is following the viewer.

Reply.description: Metadata about a reply in a conversation thread.

parent.description: Parent post to which this reply was made.

avatar.description: Avatar image URI of the author.

cid.description: The content identifier (CID) of the list.

purpose.description: The purpose or category of the list.

avatar.description: URL of the list's avatar.

listItemCount.description: The number of items in the list.

muted.description: Whether the viewer has muted the list.

blocked.description: Whether the viewer has blocked the list.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the list was indexed.

cid.description: The content identifier (CID) of the list.

purpose.description: The purpose or category of the list.

avatar.description: URL of the list's avatar.

listItemCount.description: The number of items in the list.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the list was created.

indexedAt.description: Timestamp when the list was indexed.

ErrorResponse.description: Standard error response for failed requests.

error.description: Type of error encountered during the request.

code.description: Optional error code, such as an HTTP status code.

details.description: Additional information about the error for debugging purposes.
